## CommandLocalizationContext

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/i18n/src/i18n.ts" sourceLine="80" packageName="@commandkit/i18n" />



```ts title="Signature"
interface CommandLocalizationContext {
    i18n: i18n;
    t: (key: string, options?: Record<string, unknown>) => string;
    locale: Locale;
    isEventWorker?: boolean;
}
```

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`(key: string, options?: Record&#60;string, unknown&#62;) =&#62; string`}   />

The localization function bound to the current command.

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`Locale`}   />

The locale to use for the command.
### isEventWorker

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`boolean`}   />

Whether the localization context is from event worker context.
